ygData.subject: Re: Rex's Story
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She came close to him and put a hand on his shoulder. I m truely sorry.   She thought of the time when she fled from Hell Beast s base and left her

::Battera::

She came close to him and put a hand on his shoulder. "I'm truely 
sorry."   She thought of the time when she fled from Hell Beast's 
base and left her friends there to die.  At least he had stayed to 
fight. Not fly off like the coward that she was.

She stood there and looked at him. She wanted to say something that 
would help his pain, but she could think of nothing to say. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Rex::
> 
> Rex looks at Battera as she mentions loosening up, his eyes 
clouding over. 
> "Most Maximals are cheery, yes. You should meet Firearm. He'd joke 
while 
> being tortured."
> 
> He looks ahead at her, his eyes blank. "When I was first put 
online, I was in 
> a Maximal colony. Shortly after, a Predacon group attacked us, 
destroying 
> everyone I had ever known or cared for. I was the only survivor."
> 
> Rex pauses. He could still hear the screams and gunfire as Maximal 
after 
> Maximal was tortured and brutally murdered. He had fallen into a 
ditch, a 
> dead body of a Maximal covering him there during the attack.
> 
> "I enlisted in the Maximal army, and swore to avenge the death of 
my friends."
> 
> With that, he resumes walking, falling silent.
